name: Makeup Master: Fashion Salon
description:
Do you dream of becoming a makeup master fashion girl? Do you dream to have a makeup master beauty salon? Have you been looking for a fun makeover fashion salon games？

Yeah, Makeup Master: Fashion Salon is exactly what you are waiting for! In this game, you will be a great makeup master and will have makeup salon, fashion show and dream wedding belong yourself!

Features!
◆ Makeup stylist: Choose your favorite model and give her a stunning makeup!
◆ Do-it-yourself: Pick your favorite shade of makeup including different types of lipsticks, eyeliner, Powder, mascara, and eye-shadow.
◆ Makeup styling: Various fashionable outfits and gorgeous bridal makeup
◆ Clothing games: A fashionable wardrobe filled with various dresses and outfits and accessories

What are you waiting for!
An international fashion makeup studio is open for you to play with unique and different styles.

Come on!
This is your chance to become a model fashion designer

Download Makeup Master: Fashion Salon and start your exciting and amazing adventure in this girls fashion show game.
